abstract: Canadian police seize 3 charged with planning to wreck smelter

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: CONSOLIDATED MINING & SMELTING CO OF CANADA LTD

headline.main: CANADA JAILS THREE FOR SABOTAGE PLOT; Enemy Aliens Accused of Plan to Wreck Big Smelting Plant

lead_paragraph: VANCOUVER, B.C., Jan. 2 (UP) --Canadian industries were warned tonight to strengthen "all possible precautions" against wartime sabotage, following disclosure that police had frustrated an alleged plot to wreck the biggest smelter of its kind in the British Empire.
